title: Leagues support not getting back to me - How long does it take?
body: How long does a typical ticket take to get responded to? Recently my main account was hacked and stolen. I made a ticket 5 days ago to try to recover it and riot still hasn't responded. Im not sure how long typical tickets take when it comes to leagues support since I have never had to make one.

replies.body:
There's no estimated time, as it can vastly vary depending on how many tickets have been submitted recently and how much information you've provided in your ticket. We've had quite a lot of support requests lately, so response times are a bit longer than normal.

I recommend you sit tight while our specialists work through their ticket queue and get back to you. Let me know if you have any other questions.
